name: Luna
body: --- A simple bot for Discord. ## What does Luna offer? * Memes * Games (just 1) * Tag system * Music * Fun and stuff ## How do I add Luna? Just click this beautiful link: **https://discordapp.com/oauth2/authorize?&client_id=170405995049254913&scope=bot&permissions=-1** ## If i want to run her myself, how do i do that? First make a file called `credentials.json`, where you enter your bot account's client_id and token. It should look like this. ```JSON { "token": "your bot token", "client_id": "your client_id", } ``` After this you edit `cogs/utils/checks.py` with **YOUR** ID. ## Stuff you need A lot of stuff. I really need to shorten it or make a list.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
